hero.headline: Your Trusted Fence Experts in Wilmington
hero.description: If you're looking for a fence company that delivers top-tier customer service and professional installation, backed by a 5 year warranty, Flytrap Fence Company is the fence expert you can count on.

services.title: Wood Fences
services.description: Board-on-board, cap & trim, stockade, and custom wood fence styles. Natural beauty with lasting durability.

services.title: Vinyl Fences
services.description: Low-maintenance vinyl privacy and semi-privacy fences. Weather-resistant and built to last for decades.

services.title: Chain Link
services.description: Commercial and residential chain link fencing. Galvanized and vinyl-coated options available.

services.title: Aluminum
services.description: Elegant aluminum fencing for pools, yards, and decorative purposes. Rust-free and maintenance-free.

trust.title: 5-Year Warranty
trust.description: Every fence backed by our comprehensive workmanship warranty

trust.title: Licensed & Insured
trust.description: Fully licensed professionals with complete liability coverage

trust.title: On-Time Delivery
trust.description: Projects completed on schedule with clear communication

trust.title: 5-Star Service
trust.description: Top-tier customer service from quote to completion

items.name: Jennifer Martinez
items.text: Flytrap Fence did an amazing job on our backyard privacy fence. The team was professional, showed up on time, and the quality of work exceeded our expectations. Highly recommend!

items.name: Robert Thompson
items.text: Great communication from start to finish. They helped us choose the perfect aluminum fence for our pool area. The 5-year warranty gave us peace of mind.

items.name: Sarah Collins
items.text: We needed a vinyl fence that could handle the coastal weather here in Carolina Beach. Flytrap delivered exactly what we wanted. Beautiful work, fair pricing!

contact.headline: Ready to Get Started?
contact.description: Get a free, no-obligation quote for your fence project. We typically respond within 24 hours.
contact.serviceArea: Wilmington, Leland, Hampstead, NC & Surrounding Areas
